phrases: - What do you do on your days off?
- I heard your radio show yesterday.
If you would like, how about some tea later today?
And it is really cute.
Yusarin, you should go too!
That is fine with me!
How long will this scene continue...
Yusarin is a current pop idol after all!
Something like this happening is very understandable!
What is going on?
I have a clue, but it is better if you did not know.
The Sound You Heard Sometime
First, the one for Rika!
Next, the one for Yuriko!
Group torture?
How terrible...
It is understandable... when she does stuff like that impulsively...
Ow..
Well... are you all right?
You have something to complain about?
You were just watching.
Oh, the helper is going to appear.
What is with those wounds?
I just got tortured by a mob.
Are you all right?
Should not you go to a hospital?
I am used to it, so I will be fine.
Then, let us go pummel them all in return!
I are not going.
That is too much of a hassle.
You are so boring.
The ability... is floating on air.
All right!
We got this!
It is this one!
A flying humanoid is found in Japan as well?
Is it saying that this black shadow is that person?
For now, it is only a scoop on an occult magazine like this one.
But if we leave this alone, this will turn into a huge deal.
Let us go.
Where to?
This is in the middle of the mountains.
This is just speculation,
but I think that is where this person is practicing how to fly.
So, if we keep staking out at this location, that person should appear at some point.
If we keep staking out?
For how long are you talking about?
Of course until this person shows up.
Do not make Yusarin say something like that!
Then, to procure food for all of us, let us go to the supermarket.
You serious?
Um... can you go back to Yusa, please?
That is something I will decide!
Why do I have to follow your orders?
Because it ends up like this!
Huh?
I will burn you right here, you know?
Is this team all right..?
Hot!
Hot!
I am sorry!
See here, I will burn you now!
See here!
You guys, let us go!
Why is it all corn?
When you think barbeque, you got to have roasted corn.
Barbeque?
If you do something like that, you would get found out from the smoke!
This person may decide to approach us instead, you know?
Is such a thing possible?
What else?
Steak meat, spare ribs, wieners...
Come on, now you are thinking only about meat.
But meat is good...
No, no, no...
Shishito peppers?
The spice gives a nice accent to flavors.
If you are going to eat them all, then that is fine with me.
Those two get along very well.
Can they be dating each other?
Let us buy more hams and stuff.
It has not been long since they first met, so I do not think it is gone that far.
No, no.
We should get pumpkins instead.
But well, they are a couple that is pleasant to watch.
Like, no way!
Yes, I think they are well suited for each other, too!
All alone with Yusarin!
I am glad I am alive!
All right.
Boys, grab the tent and the barbeque grill.
Kurobane and I will grab the food.
A tent?
So we are going to spend the night?
I told you that we are going to keep staking out until the ability wielder shows up.
Um, I did not bring any change of clothing...
You will not die even if you do not change clothes.
Now, let us go.
All right, we are here.
I guess we should set up the tent before dark.
Right.
Oh, it is dangerous over there.
What hole is this?
It is the remnants of a well!
If you knew about it, you could have told me about it earlier!
Well, if you fell, that would have been funny in a way.
Do not make jokes that involve life-or-death situations...
Then, let us set it up a bit further that way!
Got it!
Rest assured, I will take responsibility and plug up that hole.
I am sorry, but there is a student council camp so I do not think I can go home tonight.
This suddenly?
You cannot come home?
Yeah.
That is why I am sorry.
Are you all right?
No, no, I am all right.
See you.
Roger that.
This is useful...
Do not use me as a lighter!
How senseless are you?
What are you thinking?
This makes us stand out way too much.
Roasted corn is so delicious!
Now, everyone, eat up.
I guess I will yield this to her.
Huh?
Here you go, have some roasted corn!
Thank you so much!
This is delicious!
Is not it?
Leave it to me if it is about roasted corn!
After this...
Meat!
Meat!
Eat vegetables, too.
Spare ribs are so yummy!
The wieners are so juicy when you crunch into them!
Do not eat just meat...
sandwich some vegetables in the middle when you eat!
This meat is so delicious!
The sauce is good too, right?
In the end, I am the only one eating vegetables...
You all eat only meat?
You are all like Big Sister.
Oh, is that so?
Yes.
She is a very finicky eater.
She... well, your big sister... what kind of a person was she for you?
Let us see...
Big Sister and I have basically polar opposite personalities.
And she was such a tomboy that no boy in the neighborhood could win against her.
But to me, she was a very kind big sister.
And I loved her the way she was, too.
I always tagged along behind her.
Oh, I guess I have been talking too much...
when it comes to Big Sister, I just get so engrossed...
No, I kind of understand how you feel.
There are so many enemies!
Yusarin is in a crisis, maybe?
It will be all right!
Leave it all to me
You stay out of this!
T-The point where I can show off..!
You guys are completely forgetting the reason why we are here...
Come to think, where is she?
Is something wrong?
Well, um...
What is that music you are always listening to?
This?
It is a band called ZHIEND.
I do not know them.
It is the band that my big brother loved.
Is something wrong?
No...
Can I listen to that for a bit?
Why...
I feel like I have felt this before...
How is it?
Somehow...
I get a strange feeling that I am standing all alone in a vast open space.
You understand it, do not you!
That is right!
The music ZHIEND creates is very vast and downright lonely.
I believe it is because the vocalist who also composes the songs is blind in both eyes.
The imagery is that of scenery extending as far as you can go...
For now, I am merely recording this poor fiend of cheating.
But my dream is to film a ZHIEND music video.
I have never seen this expression on her face before...
I would be okay with a documentary following ZHIEND's activity, too.
Yeah.
Do not film poor old me.
Please go ahead and film them..
Of course, I will never film you ever again.
I will give that to you, including the player.
Well, that would make me feel bad.
I have quite a bit saved up thanks to jobs concerning abilities,
so I will buy a new one.
Do not worry about it.
I see... then, I will take it.
Yup.
We will do night watch in pairs.
First off, you guys sleep for four hours.
When you wake up, take our spots and watch till morning.
Otosaka, it is our turn now.
Yup, time to switch!
Oh, it is that time already...
This again... who was that person...
A rainbow trout!
I fished a rainbow trout!
Dammit, I will fish up one bigger than that!
Trout, trout, come to me!
I am not going to lose, either!
All right, got one!
Rainbow trouts are tasty, too.
Yusarin, this one is roasted in a good way!
I am not Yusarin!
But, I guess I will yield it to Yusa.
I can eat this?
Yes, of course!
This is so delicious!
Things like this are nice every so often, right?
Yes!
Can it be that she just wants to play..?
Um, are we spending the night here again today?
Yes.
Do you have a problem with that?
I was thinking I wanted to take a bath...
That is fine.
I have one all ready.
Please, this way.
Um...
This is..?
Here is a towel and some soap.
Damn you!
You got all this ready on the assumption that I will do something!
I will keep proper watch of the boys for you.
You said there was a bath all ready?
It is only for girls.
Boys can go wipe themselves down at the river.
You mean I cannot bathe in the water that Yusarin has bathed in?
Such a turn-off!
You are the type that looks thinner when clothed...
Because of my ability, I had to train my body.
No matter how much armor I wore under my uniform,
I had to build a body that would not get too injured.
You went that far just to properly use your ability...
Yes.
But this may not be merely other people's business, you know?
What do you mean by that?
In the future, there may be a challenge for you
that is beyond all your expectations.
That is what I mean.
With an ability that let us me take over someone for only 5 seconds, what can I do?
That is for you to
No, nothing.
What?
How you put it gets me curious.
With that attractive a face, you might have issues dealing with women...
I just did not want to say that because I am annoyed by it.
Yeah, really.
I was just dumped by a intelligent and beautiful girl thanks to this ability.
That was a wise choice.
Love and romance should be built up after we are freed of these abilities.
Just exactly how old do we need to be for them to be gone?
It should be gone by the time we graduate from high school.
Two more years, huh... that is a long time.
Yes.
For us, it is a very long time.
In any case... this is too cold...
This warms me up...
Then, we will sleep using the same rotation as yesterday.
Tomorrow is Monday, right?
Are we going to head straight to school from here?
I have been telling you from the beginning that we are staking out until the person shows up.
This is just too impossible... it is as if we are living here now.
That is exactly what I am after.
Besides, ditching class will not affect our school reports at all.
Even so, I would really like to go home.
I have a younger sister.
I already know that.
Then, I will promise to be back in the morning, so let me go home for now.
I cannot.
If I allow that for you, everyone else will say the same thing.
Besides, I think it will be all right.
What will?
I believe everything will be squared out by tomorrow.
Corn again...
Um...
What are you doing all the way here?
Someone really showed up!
Is it this guy?
Well, we all ran away from home.
We each have our own reasons, but we just hit it off really well.
Another obvious lie...
Do you mean you are going to continue staying here?
Yes.
We are planning on staying here forever.
Because people will not find us out if we are here.
But I found you out.
I am sure your parents are worried as well.
If you call the police, you will be detained as well.
Why?
This is private property.
Private property - Keep out!
And this, too.
This is you, right?
What is that?
A scoop article of you practicing flight.
Flight..?
In mountains that people can normally enter, you can easily catch the eye of others.
This place is close, and for you, a convenient mountain.
But we camped out, and do not seem to show any signs of leaving.
You got restless, and showed yourself before us.
So that you could shoo us away, then practice your flying once again.
I cannot fly.
You must be insane.
I will call the police for you.
I think you are pretty insane yourself for coming all the way out here all alone, too?
I came to pick some chestnuts.
There are not any chestnuts this time of the year, right?
And I already recorded evidence that you were here at this time.
How troublesome!
Give it to me.
I will erase it!
Yes!
She used the well as a pitfall?
Of course, if you fall into a hole that you do not know the bottom of,
you would use your ability and fly, right?
Though, I had shoved some hay at the bottom for cushioning.
But thanks to you, I have an amazing footage for a scoop.
A trap that she did not even tell us about!
She is just like the devil!
Give me that!
Otosaka, take over his body!
I will defeat him using my teleport while you are taking him over!
I hate it because it hurts...
Dammit!
This is mine!
He is going to get away!
Drats!
I have no choice but to do it..!
What height!
I have to control it for now!
Stop!
Stop!
Stop!
Stop!
You took such a reckless risk there.
I should have just taken over him immediately instead of complaining.
What is this?
What happened?
Well, a bruise or a broken bone.
That is good enough for an end result.
My camcorder is fine, too.
It is a good thing you survived.
What the hell are you guys..?
We all have special abilities as well.
But, these abilities are like diseases that only show up during adolescence.
It will disappear in due time.
But, if someone finds out about your ability, you become a guinea pig for scientists.
You do not want that, do you?
Then, what if your ability disappeared while you are flying?
You will fall to your death, you know?
Is it something to risk your life doing?
Misa, Please.
Here.
I see...
I thought that this power was something granted just to me... but there were others.
I wanted to someday freely fly through the skies.
I even had a dream of becoming Skyhigh Saito the Hollywood star...
What a corny name!
I understand that feeling, but for yourself as well, please do not use that ability from now on.
I got it.
Thank you so much.
That ended peacefully.
Oh, that took so long!
Really.
That is totally how I feel.
I am back.
I did not think the student council was something this busy...
I cannot help it.
Big Brother, you are very competent.
Are you being pulled all over the place?
It is not that extravagant...
Then, to my big brother who is doing his best with student council activities, I have a feast!
Chanpon noodles with lots of vegetables!
It is not red...
This is... doable!
Time to eat!
Finally!
How is it?
Delicious!
So delicious it makes me cry!
Actually, I wanted to use the pizza sauce as a secret ingredient, but I only have a tiny bit left.
If you can make food this delicious,
you can leave the pizza sauce out of all the other food, cannot you?
The Otosaka pizza sauce is a secret recipe
that needs to be handed down to the very last generation.
But, when I was about to go to the supermarket,
the security guard stopped me for some reason, and I could not buy the ingredients...
Nice security!
This is the first incident that makes me feel happy about moving here!
But this is delicious on its own, so you do not need any secret ingredients.
If you say so, that saves me a lot...
All right!
In the end, I succeeded in sealing away that pizza sauce!
You really are not feeling well after all?
No, no, I am fine now!
I had so many stories I wanted you to hear while you were gone, Big Brother Yu.
What is up?
Ayu was suddenly asked out by one of the boy classmates!
And what did you do?
Let us see...
Do not put on an air...
I politely declined the offer!
Oh man, that could have been a pivotal moment that changes your entire life...
Big Brother
Yu, you wanted Ayu to have a boyfriend or something?
It depends on the guy.
It really does have to be someone better than Big Brother Yu!
Someone like that does not come by all that often.
Indeed.
I am sorry.
Maybe you have a cold?
You are feverish... how is your appetite?
I am fine.
I can finish eating all of this.
37.8 degrees...
You totally have caught a cold.
After your body warms up by taking a bath, you need to crawl into your futon immediately.
Okay?
Roger that.
I am sorry.
Can you fall asleep like this?
I will be all right.
All right.
Sleep tight.
Good night!
Yup.
Well... if she stays put, it should be all right.
